body.name: BELLA 3 Qt Manual Air Fryer Oven and 5-in-1 Multicooker with Removable Nonstick and Dishwasher Safe Crisping Tray and Basket, 1400 Watt Heating System, Matte Blue

features: EFFORTLESS COOKING AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: Say goodbye to complicated buttons and hello to delicious, hassle-free dishes! Our small air fryers boast simple knob controls, which make cooking easy and fun. Enjoy creating delicious, gourmet meals in minutes

PERFECT FOR SMALL GATHERINGS: With a capacity of up to 2.5 pounds of food, this mini air fryer can feed up to 2-4 people. From crispy french fries and fish sticks to mouthwatering chicken thighs and wings, it's a crowd-pleaser for any occasion

UNLEASH YOUR CULINARY CREATIVITY: Our 5-IN-1 Multi-Cooker lets you Air Fry, Broil, Bake, Roast, or Reheat meals with ease. Powered by a 1400 watt heating element and Circular Heat Technology, the small oven ensures it cook your meals crispy and evenly

INDULGE IN HEALTHY DELIGHTS: Enjoy guilt-free meals with 88% less fat and 65% fewer calories than typical fast food restaurants. The PFOA-free Nonstick basket and crisping tray are removable and dishwasher safe, making cleanup of the mini oven a breeze

COMPACT SIZE: Thanks to its compact size, our electric fryer fits easily on any countertop, saving you valuable space without sacrificing performance. These kitchen appliances are absolute new house essentials and a must-have for your college dorm
body.description: Discover a world of culinary possibilities with the BELLA Manual Air Fryer and let your creativity soar in the kitchen. Elevate your cooking game, simplify your life, and add a touch of joy to every meal. At BELLA, we're passionate about making your countertops vibrant and exciting. We've created a range of kitchen small appliances that add fun and excitement to your cooking journey, and our small air fryer is a shining example of our commitment. Its compact size easily fits any kitchen counter, saving you valuable space while adding a pop of color to your culinary haven. We've packed it with versatile features to unleash your culinary creativity. With our 5-IN-1 Multi-Cooker, you can air fry, broil, bake, roast, or reheat meals with ease. Explore the included recipe book for endless inspiration and discover new flavors that will tantalize your taste buds. Powered by a 1400 watt heating element and our innovative Circular Heat Technology, our deep fryer ensures your dishes come out crispy and evenly cooked with NO PREHEAT needed. No more waiting around—get your food on the table faster than ever and impress your loved ones with your culinary prowess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Def a good bargain. Easy to clean and works well
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ve had this for about a week and made all kinds of things—fresh and frozen chicken cutlets, veggies, fries, frozen Turkey burgers and even meatloaf. Makes everything nice and crispy. Simple to use. Some trial and error on cook times but it’s easy to check food part way through cooking and get the hang of it.Def does a good job and is much quieter and runs cooler that I thought it might. You can hear the sound level in the video, it’s not bad as all.It’s very easy to clean, which was a big concern for me. The rack and basket are dishwasher safe but so far all I’ve had to do is wipe with a soapy sponge and rinse. Nothing sticks to it either.It is small but I knew that. I don’t have the space for much more. For one it’s perfect and for two you can manage. For a family it would only work for small snacks and sides or else you’d have to do many small batches. I fit three chicken thighs in it, or two breasts. The meatloaf was two half lb loaves, I had to shape them weird to make them fit without touching. It also fit 1 hash brown patty and two sausage patties at once. Fits a good size portion of roasted veggies and they cook fast so doing two batches isn’t a big deal. Also made a pizza on mini naan bread that fit well. Probably could have fit 1 and a half naan if I had cut it up.Great price for this. It doesn’t have digital dials but that doesn’t matter to me and worth saving the money. I have a few other Bella appliances and they have all lasted long. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice for one or two servings
reviews.reviewText: Turns out this air fryer operates very nicely. Since I received it, I have used it a few times…No dirty pots and pans…cooks efficiently…food tastes good….you can pull out the basket at anytime to check or turn over….a good buy…thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I love this air fryer,so easy to use,French fries came out crisp, easier to do them in the air fryer, instead of the oven.I can't wait to do chicken in it,and onion rings.The price was right ,and the book was helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but efficient
reviews.reviewText: Cooking area is a little small. Can’t fit too much in it. Good for small servings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our friend loves this!
reviews.reviewText: We gave this to our recently widowed friend. He decided to try it one night for dinner and called us all excited! He LOVES it! The size is perfect for one and it makes him eat much better than before. Plus cleanup is easy. He did say that there were no recipes included but I sent him some via phone and he is becoming a better cook! He said it changed his life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Meal for one
reviews.reviewText: Love love love. Doesn’t take up a ton of counter space. Cleans easy. Kids can use it easy enough. Nice when you just want to cook up for one person and not use a giant air fryer. Also is adorable and the white color still cleans up nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and good quality
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect size for my office at work. The design is really basic, but it’s powerful and gets the job done.

I have the same brand, but I use it so much. I decided to buy one that has a larger capacity size it’s red that matches the rest of my appliances solid purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best way to cook for easy and health!! Buy one!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is easy and so good for you, super health conscience a win win now have bought two for Christmas gifts for family

J'ai remplacé ma friteuse à uile, qui était brisée par celle-ci. Livraison rapide, friteuse de bonne fabrication, description du produit correcte et comentaires nombreux pour une bonne connaissance d produit. Je n'ai utilisé que 2 fois, mais cela s'avère prometteur. Je n'ai essayé que les frites congelées, et je crois avoir trop rempli le contenant. Au second essai, j'ai rempli qu'à moitié et arrosé de très peu d'huile (1 c. environ). A demi cuisson j'ai retourné les frites pour les faire cuire uniformément et cela a été parfait. C'Est moins graisseux que les frites dans l'huile et presque aussi bon. J'essaierai les beignes sans crainte, car je crois que ce mode de cuisson conviendra bien.Le prix est très convenable, et la facilité d'utilisation aussi. Un bouton pour le temps et l'autre pour les degrés. Simple. Je ne regrette pas cet achat.
This appliance is easy to use and the results are fab!
